DOC.brief_summary: This study aim elucidate effect deer bone extract NS cognitive function improvement safety healthy adult age 40 65 year report decline subjective cognitive function use multimodal neuroimaging neurocognitive assessment .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Deer Bone Extract NS Improvement Cognitive-Bio-Markers Cognitive Functions
DOC.criteria: Age 40 65 year old , Global Deterioration Scale score ( GDS ) 2 High school high level education . Current pregnancy breastfeed Evidence neurologic medical condition Axis I diagnosis assess board certify psychiatrist use Structured Clinical Interview Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorder , 4th edition ( DSMIV ) ( SCIDIV ) , One major depressive episode last 12 month Minimental status examination score 24 less Clinical Dementia Rating score 0.5 suggest cognitive impairment beyond selfperceived subjective deficit Intelligence quotient le 70 Any history head trauma involve loss consciousness seizure Contraindications magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) Use psychotropics last 3 month Use oral contraceptive medication Participation clinical trial study period might affect outcome present study .
